participant_1.background:
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
my parents met at woodstock.
I always make time for a good anime before work, and I always pack a banana for my morning run.
i had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.
i like getting packages in the mail.
I'd like to talk about how we can make the world a more joyful place.
I'm going to go shopping and test drive my new car.
i can say the alphabet backwards.

content.text: Hi there, how's your day going?
It's going well! How about yours?
It's going well too, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready to watch some anime before I head to work.
That sounds fun! I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.
I love coffee too! I always pack a banana for my morning run. Do you have any interesting hobbies?
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog. I also like to learn new things, and I'm always up for a good conversation.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to travel more. I'm not much of a blogger, but I love learning new things too.
Well, I'm sure you've learned a lot about cats and fashion! I'm actually kind of a cat person myself.
Oh, yeah! I have a cat named Mittens. He's a total goofball.
That's a great name! I love cats. They're so cute and cuddly.
I'm glad we agree! Cats are the best.
